attributes.action: Call for a National Day of Prayer for the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please will Mr Brown, along with the full Government and members of all Politial Parties, and Her Majesty, Queen Elizabeth ll, declare a National Day of Prayer, when all in any kind of authority (not only, though including, the Prime Minister and other Government Ministers) will be prayed for, for wise rule and justice.
Also for a return to a decent value system, leading to a lessening of the levels of crime and violence and the re-development of a Community spirit.

Churches should be requested to hold a well publicised Service, but others of other Faiths should be welcomed to join in, or hold their own services in their own places of Worship, on that same day, to pray for the above.
